title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.2 - Designation of records access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.2 - Designation of records access officer

State Regulations
(a) The records manager in the FOIL
Processing Center of the Department of Motor Vehicles, Swan Street Building, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12228, shall be the records access
officer. (b) The records access
officer is responsible for maintaining a master index listing by subject
matter, records required to be disclosed by article 6 of the Public Officers

Law, and for receiving applications on a form prescribed by the Commissioner of

Motor Vehicles, for copies of records or inspection of records, which are
required to be disclosed by article 6 of the Public Officers Law and are listed
in the departmental master index as available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
160.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
